replies.author: TNT嘉音
replies.txt_content:
baibai~ 发表于 2016-11-23 18:49
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!
原因是内存溢出，建议调低内存或用个超级兔子优化一下内存。
